resources.string: This app does use location information because scanning for Bluetooth LE devices requires this permission\nIn addition the location information is sent to other users in the DisasterRadio mesh network
As location permission has not been granted, this app cannot scan for Bluetooth LE devices.
PAIRING requested\n-> Perform pairing steps. Connect again

https://disaster.radio

a resilient communications network.

This app connects over BLE to a nearby LoRa node that runs the DisasterRadio SW.

disaster.radio is a collaborative project between Sudo Mesh and Secure Scuttlebutt, with additional support from the Internet Society and Institute For the Future

Except where otherwise noted, this source code is licensed under a GNU General Public License v3 license.
Neither GPS nor the network location are available to detect your current position. Map data will not show your own position
